an9.94:1: "Bhikkhus, for direct knowledge of lust, nine things are to be developed. What nine? The first jhﾄ］a, the second jhﾄ］a, the third jhﾄ］a, the fourth jhﾄ］a, the base of the infinity of space, the base of the infinity of consciousness, the base of nothingness, the base of neither-perception-nor-non-perception, and the cessation of perception and feeling. For direct knowledge of lust, these nine things are to be developed."
